verses.verse: Now there was a man <WH376> of Binyamin <WH1144>, whose name <WH8034> was Kish <WH7027>, the son <WH1121> of Abiel <WH22>, the son <WH1121> of Zeror <WH6872>, the son <WH1121> of Bechorath <WH1064>, the son <WH1121> of Aphiah <WH647>, a Benjamite <WH1145>, a mighty <WH1368> man <WH376> of power <WH2428>.

And he had a son <WH1121>, whose name <WH8034> was Saul <WH7586>, a choice young man <WH970>, and a goodly <WH2896>: and there was not among the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> a goodlier <WH2896> person <WH376> than he: from his shoulders <WH7926> and upward <WH4605> he was higher <WH1364> than any of the people <WH5971>.

And the asses <WH860> of Kish <WH7027> Saul's <WH7586> father <WH1> were lost <WH6> <WH8799>. And Kish <WH7027> said <WH559> <WH8799> to Saul <WH7586> his son <WH1121>, Take <WH3947> <WH8798> now one <WH259> of the servants <WH5288> with thee, and arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go <WH3212> <WH8798> seek <WH1245> <WH8761> the asses <WH860>.

And he passed through <WH5674> <WH8799> mount <WH2022> Efrayim <WH669>, and passed through <WH5674> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Shalisha <WH8031>, but they found <WH4672> <WH8804> them not: then they passed through <WH5674> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of Shalim <WH8171>, and there they were not: and he passed through <WH5674> <WH8799> the land <WH776> of the Benjamites <WH1145>, but they found <WH4672> <WH8804> them not.

And when they were come <WH935> <WH8804> to the land <WH776> of Zuph <WH6689>, Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8804> to his servant <WH5288> that was with him, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us return <WH7725> <WH8799>; lest my father <WH1> leave <WH2308> <WH8799> caring for the asses <WH860>, and take thought <WH1672> <WH8804> for us.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Behold now, there is in this city <WH5892> a man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, and he is an honourable <WH3513> <WH8737> man <WH376>; all that he saith <WH1696> <WH8762> cometh <WH935> <WH8799> surely to pass <WH935> <WH8800>: now let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> thither; peradventure he can shew <WH5046> <WH8686> us our way <WH1870> that we should go <WH1980> <WH8804>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586> to his servant <WH5288>, But, behold, if we go <WH3212> <WH8799>, what shall we bring <WH935> <WH8686> the man <WH376>? for the bread <WH3899> is spent <WH235> <WH8804> in our vessels <WH3627>, and there is not a present <WH8670> to bring <WH935> <WH8687> to the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>: what have we?

And the servant <WH5288> answered <WH6030> <WH8800> Saul <WH7586> again <WH3254> <WH8686>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, I have <WH4672> <WH8738> here at hand <WH3027> the fourth part <WH7253> of a shekel <WH8255> of silver <WH3701>: that will I give <WH5414> <WH8804> to the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430>, to tell <WH5046> <WH8689> us our way <WH1870>.

(Beforetime <WH6440> in Yisra'EL <WH3478>, when a man <WH376> went <WH3212> <WH8800> to enquire <WH1875> <WH8800> of 'Elohim <WH430>, thus he spake <WH559> <WH8804>, Come <WH3212> <WH8798>, and let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> to the seer <WH7200> <WH8802>: for he that is now <WH3117> called a Prophet <WH5030> was beforetime <WH6440> called <WH7121> <WH8735> a Seer <WH7200> <WH8802>.)

Then said <WH1697> Saul <WH7586> to his servant <WH5288>, Well <WH2896> said <WH559> <WH8799>; come <WH3212> <WH8798>, let us go <WH3212> <WH8799>. So they went <WH3212> <WH8799> unto the city <WH5892> where the man <WH376> of 'Elohim <WH430> was.

And as they went up <WH5927> <WH8802> the hill <WH4608> to the city <WH5892>, they found <WH4672> <WH8804> young maidens <WH5291> going out <WH3318> <WH8802> to draw <WH7579> <WH8800> water <WH4325>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Is <WH3426> the seer <WH7200> <WH8802> here?

And they answered <WH6030> <WH8799> them, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, He is <WH3426>; behold, he is before <WH6440> you: make haste <WH4116> <WH8761> now, for he came <WH935> <WH8804> to day <WH3117> to the city <WH5892>; for there is a sacrifice <WH2077> of the people <WH5971> to day <WH3117> in the high place <WH1116>:

As soon as ye be come <WH935> <WH8800> into the city <WH5892>, ye shall straightway <WH3651> find <WH4672> <WH8799> him, before he go up <WH5927> <WH8799> to the high place <WH1116> to eat <WH398> <WH8800>: for the people <WH5971> will not eat <WH398> <WH8799> until he come <WH935> <WH8800>, because he doth bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the sacrifice <WH2077>; and afterwards <WH310> <WH3651> they eat <WH398> <WH8799> that be bidden <WH7121> <WH8803>. Now therefore get you up <WH5927> <WH8798>; for about this time <WH3117> ye shall find <WH4672> <WH8799> him.

And they went up <WH5927> <WH8799> into <WH8432> the city <WH5892>: and when they were come <WH935> <WH8802> into the city <WH5892>, behold, SH'mu'el <WH8050> came out <WH3318> <WH8802> against <WH7125> <WH8800> them, for to go up <WH5927> <WH8800> to the high place <WH1116>.
Now the YY <WH3068> had told <WH1540> <WH8804> SH'mu'el <WH8050> in his ear <WH241> a <WH259> day <WH3117> before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586> came <WH935> <WH8800>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

To morrow <WH4279> about this time <WH6256> I will send <WH7971> <WH8799> thee a man <WH376> out of the land <WH776> of Binyamin <WH1144>, and thou shalt anoint <WH4886> <WH8804> him to be captain <WH5057> over my people <WH5971> Yisra'EL <WH3478>, that he may save <WH3467> <WH8689> my people <WH5971> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>: for I have looked <WH7200> <WH8804> upon my people <WH5971>, because their cry <WH6818> is come <WH935> <WH8804> unto me.

And when SH'mu'el <WH8050> saw <WH7200> <WH8804> Saul <WH7586>, the YY <WH3068> said <WH6030> <WH8804> unto him, Behold the man <WH376> whom I spake <WH559> <WH8804> to thee of! this same shall reign <WH6113> <WH8799> over my people <WH5971>.

Then Saul <WH7586> drew near <WH5066> <WH8799> to SH'mu'el <WH8050> in <WH8432> the gate <WH8179>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Tell <WH5046> <WH8685> me, I pray thee, where <WH335> the seer's <WH7200> <WH8802> house <WH1004> is.

And SH'mu'el <WH8050> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I am the seer <WH7200> <WH8802>: go up <WH5927> <WH8798> before <WH6440> me unto the high place <WH1116>; for ye shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> with me to day <WH3117>, and to morrow <WH1242> I will let thee go <WH7971> <WH8765>, and will tell <WH5046> <WH8686> thee all that is in thine heart <WH3824>.

And as for thine asses <WH860> that were lost <WH6> <WH8802> three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ago <WH3117>, set <WH7760> <WH8799> not thy mind <WH3820> on them; for they are found <WH4672> <WH8738>. And on whom is all the desire <WH2532> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>? Is it not on thee, and on all thy father's <WH1> house <WH1004> ?

And Saul <WH7586> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Am not I a Benjamite <WH1145>, of the smallest <WH6996> of the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>? and my family <WH4940> the least <WH6810> of all the families <WH4940> of the tribe <WH7626> of Binyamin <WH1144>? wherefore then speakest <WH1696> <WH8765> thou so <WH1697> to me?

And SH'mu'el <WH8050> took <WH3947> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586> and his servant <WH5288>, and brought <WH935> <WH8686> them into the parlour <WH3957>, and made them sit <WH5414> <WH8799> in the chiefest <WH7218> place <WH4725> among them that were bidden <WH7121> <WH8803>, which were about thirty <WH7970> persons <WH376>.

And SH'mu'el <WH8050> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the cook <WH2876>, Bring <WH5414> <WH8798> the portion <WH4490> which I gave <WH5414> <WH8804> thee, of which I said <WH559> <WH8804> unto thee, Set <WH7760> <WH8798> it by thee.

And the cook <WH2876> took up <WH7311> <WH8686> the shoulder <WH7785>, and that which was upon it, and set <WH7760> <WH8799> it before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586>. And SH'mu'el said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold that which is left <WH7604> <WH8737> ! set <WH7760> <WH8798> it before <WH6440> thee, and eat <WH398> <WH8798>: for unto this time <WH4150> hath it been kept <WH8104> <WH8803> for thee since I said <WH559> <WH8800>, I have invited <WH7121> <WH8804> the people <WH5971>. So Saul <WH7586> did eat <WH398> <WH8799> with SH'mu'el <WH8050> that day <WH3117>.
And when they were come down <WH3381> <WH8799> from the high place <WH1116> into the city <WH5892>, SH'mu'el communed <WH1696> <WH8762> with Saul <WH7586> upon the top of the house <WH1406>.

And they arose early <WH7925> <WH8686>: and it came to pass about the spring <WH5927> <WH8800> of the day <WH7837>, that SH'mu'el <WH8050> called <WH7121> <WH8799> Saul <WH7586> to the top of the house <WH1406>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Up <WH6965> <WH8798>, that I may send thee away <WH7971> <WH8762>. And Saul <WH7586> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and they went out <WH3318> <WH8799> both <WH8147> of them, he and SH'mu'el <WH8050>, abroad <WH2351>.

And as they were going down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the end <WH7097> of the city <WH5892>, SH'mu'el <WH8050> said <WH559> <WH8804> to Saul <WH7586>, Bid <WH559> <WH8798> the servant <WH5288> pass on <WH5674> <WH8799> before <WH6440> us, (and he passed on <WH5674> <WH8798>,) but stand <WH5975> <WH8798> thou still a while <WH3117>, that I may shew <WH8085> <WH8686> thee the word <WH1697> of 'Elohim <WH430>.
